name: 7 Wonders 2 HD (Full)
description:
7 Wonders 2 transports you back in time to far away lands to complete an unbelievable mission: Build the 7 Wonders of the World! Match three to give your workers the resources they need to build the unbelievable sights from Stonehenge to the Taj Mahal. Incredible new power-ups and bonuses help you piece together the hidden map and uncover the secret route leading to the most wondrous sight.

Whether you’re returning to 7 Wonders or are new to the game, 7 Wonders 2 offers addictive, fresh matching fun!

FEATURES

7 all new locations!
New explosive power-ups, including Clock Stopper and Phantom Bonus
Enhanced gameplay and beautiful graphics!
